name: Pogo
description: '''Christopher Nicholas''' "'''Nick'''" '''Bertke''' (born 26 July 1988), better known by his [[stage name]] '''Pogo''', which is symbolized by an icon of a rabbit, is a [[South Africa]]n-born [[South African Australians|Australian]] electronic musician. Much of his work consists of recording small sounds, quotes, and melodies from films, TV programmes or other sources, and sequencing the sounds together to form a new piece of music (a genre also known as [[plunderphonics]]). A number of Pogo's works consist almost entirely of the sounds he [[Sampling (music)|samples]], with few or no additional music or sound samples.
